verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> now there was רָעָב֩ <WH7458> Then there was a famine בִּימֵ֨י <WH3117> in the days דָוִ֜ד <WH1732> of David שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three שָׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> years שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year וַיְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> enquired דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> and David אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> of יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD ס וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> [It is] for Saul וְאֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַדָּמִ֔ים <WH1818> and for [his] bloody עַל־ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he הֵמִ֖ית <WH4191> because he slew אֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּבְעֹנִֽים׃ <WH1393> the Gibeonites

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> called הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king לַגִּבְעֹנִ֖ים <WH1393> the Gibeonites וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> to וְהַגִּבְעֹנִ֞ים <WH1393> unto them (now the Gibeonites לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not מִבְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> [were] not of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but מִיֶּ֣תֶר <WH3499> but of the remnant הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel נִשְׁבְּע֣וּ <WH7650> had sworn לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like וַיְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <WH1245> sought שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> unto them and Saul לְהַכֹּתָ֔ם <WH5221> to slay בְּקַנֹּאת֥וֹ <WH7065> them in his zeal לִבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> Wherefore David אֶל־ <WH413> to הַגִּבְעֹנִ֔ים <WH1393> unto the Gibeonites מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> What shall I do לָכֶ֑ם וּבַמָּ֣ה <WH4100> and how אֲכַפֵּ֔ר <WH3722> for you? and wherewith shall I make the atonement וּבָרְכ֖וּ <WH1288> that ye may bless אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> the inheritance יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <WH559> said ל֣וֹ הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗ים <WH1393> And the Gibeonites אֵֽין־ <WH369> have [לִי כ] (לָ֜נוּ ק) כֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> unto him We will have no silver וְזָהָב֙ <WH2091> nor gold עִם־ <WH5973> of שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> Saul וְעִם־ <WH5973> or בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> nor of his house וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> no לָ֥נוּ אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> any man לְהָמִ֣ית <WH4191> neither for us shalt thou kill בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> And he said מָֽה־ <WH4100> whatever אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you אֹמְרִ֖ים <WH559> What ye shall say אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> [that] will I do לָכֶֽם׃

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> And they answered אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> The man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who כִּלָּ֔נוּ <WH3615> that consumed וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> and who דִּמָּה־ <WH1819> us and that devised לָ֑נוּ נִשְׁמַ֕דְנוּ <WH8045> against us [that] we should be destroyed מֵֽהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <WH3320> from remaining בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any גְּבֻ֥ל <WH1366> in any of the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

[יְנָתָן־ כ] (יֻתַּן־ <WH5414> be given לָ֜נוּ ק) שִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> Let seven אֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> men מִבָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> of his sons וְהוֹקַֽעֲנוּם֙ <WH3363> unto us and we will hang them up לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּגִבְעַ֥ת <WH1390> in Gibeah שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> of Saul בְּחִ֣יר <WH972> did choose יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [whom] the LORD ס וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אֶתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> be delivered

וַיַּחְמֹ֣ל <WH2550> spared הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> But the king עַל־ <WH5921> because מְפִי־ <WH4648> Mephibosheth בֹ֖שֶׁת <WH1322> ashamed בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> of Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> of Saul עַל־ <WH5921> because שְׁבֻעַ֤ת <WH7621> oath יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> because of the LORD'S אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בֵּֽינֹתָ֔ם <WH996> was between בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> that [was] between them between David וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> was between יְהוֹנָתָ֥ן <WH3083> and Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> of Saul

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> But the king אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁ֠נֵי <WH8147> the two בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> sons רִצְפָּ֤ה <WH7532> of Rizpah בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter אַיָּה֙ <WH345> of Aiah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יָלְדָ֣ה <WH3205> whom she bare לְשָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> unto Saul אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְמֹנִ֖י <WH764> Armoni וְאֶת־ <WH853> מְפִבֹ֑שֶׁת <WH4648> and Mephibosheth וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֵ֗שֶׁת <WH2568> and the five בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> sons מִיכַ֣ל <WH4324> of Michal בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom יָלְדָ֛ה <WH3205> whom she brought up לְעַדְרִיאֵ֥ל <WH5741> for Adriel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בַּרְזִלַּ֖י <WH1271> of Barzillai הַמְּחֹלָתִֽי׃ <WH4259> the Meholathite

וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֞ם <WH5414> And he delivered בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> them into the hands הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗ים <WH1393> of the Gibeonites וַיֹּקִיעֻ֤ם <WH3363> and they hanged בָּהָר֙ <WH2022> them in the hill לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> and they fell [שִׁבַעְתָּיִם כ] (שְׁבַעְתָּ֖ם <WH7651> seven ק) יָ֑חַד <WH3162> together [וְהֵם כ] (וְהֵ֨מָּה <WH1992> like ק) הֻמְת֜וּ <WH4191> and were put to death בִּימֵ֤י <WH3117> in the days קָצִיר֙ <WH7105> of harvest בָּרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> in the first [תְחִלַּת כ] (בִּתְחִלַּ֖ת <WH8462> Tachmonite ק) קְצִ֥יר <WH7105> harvest שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <WH8184> of barley

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took רִצְפָּה֩ <WH7532> And Rizpah בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter אַיָּ֨ה <WH345> of Aiah אֶת־ <WH853> הַשַּׂ֜ק <WH8242> sackcloth וַתַּטֵּ֨הוּ <WH5186> and spread לָ֤הּ אֶל־ <WH413> about הַצּוּר֙ <WH6697> it for her upon the rock מִתְּחִלַּ֣ת <WH8462> from the beginning קָצִ֔יר <WH7105> of harvest עַ֛ד <WH5704> until נִתַּךְ־ <WH5413> dropped מַ֥יִם <WH4325> until water עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> upon them out of heaven וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> neither נָתְנָה֩ <WH5414> and suffered ע֨וֹף <WH5775> neither the birds הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> of the air לָנ֤וּחַ <WH5117> to rest עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> on יוֹמָ֔ם <WH3119> on them by day וְאֶת־ <WH853> חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> nor the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> by night

וַיֻּגַּ֖ד <WH5046> And it was told לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> David אֵ֧ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשְׂתָ֛ה <WH6213> had done רִצְפָּ֥ה <WH7532> what Rizpah בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter אַיָּ֖ה <WH345> of Aiah פִּלֶ֥גֶשׁ <WH6370> the concubine שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> of Saul

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמ֤וֹת <WH6106> the bones שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> of Saul וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמוֹת֙ <WH6106> and the bones יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> of Jonathan בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son מֵאֵ֕ת <WH853> בַּעֲלֵ֖י <WH1167> from the men יָבֵ֣ישׁ <WH3003> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who גָּנְב֨וּ <WH1589> which had stolen אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> מֵרְחֹ֣ב <WH7339> them from the street בֵּֽית־ שַׁ֗ן <WH1052> of Bethshan אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who [תְּלוּם כ] (תְּלָא֥וּם <WH8518> hang ק) [שָׁם כ] [הַפְּלִשְׁתִּים כ] (שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> in it ק) (פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines ק) בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> them when הַכּ֧וֹת <WH5221> had slain פְּלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <WH6430> where the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul בַּגִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <WH1533> in Gilboa

וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> And he brought up מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמ֣וֹת <WH6106> from thence the bones שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמ֖וֹת <WH6106> and the bones יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> of Jonathan בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son וַיַּ֣אַסְפ֔וּ <WH622> and they gathered אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמ֖וֹת <WH6106> the bones הַמּוּקָעִֽים׃ <WH3363> of them that were hanged

וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <WH6912> buried אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמוֹת־ <WH6106> And the bones שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> of Saul וִיהוֹנָֽתָן־ <WH3083> and Jonathan בְּ֠נוֹ <WH1121> his son בְּאֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> they in the country בִּנְיָמִ֜ן <WH1144> of Benjamin בְּצֵלָ֗ע <WH6762> in Zelah בְּקֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH6913> in the sepulchre קִ֣ישׁ <WH7027> of Kish אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and they performed כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> commanded הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> all that the king וַיֵּעָתֵ֧ר <WH6279> was intreated אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> that God לָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> for the land אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And after כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> after that פ

וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> become ע֧וֹד <WH5750> again מִלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> had yet war לַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> Moreover the Philistines אֶת־ <WH854> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> again with Israel וַיֵּ֨רֶד <WH3381> went down דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> and David וַעֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> and his servants עִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> and as they וַיִּלָּחֲמ֥וּ <WH3898> with him and fought אֶת־ <WH854> against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> against the Philistines וַיָּ֥עַף <WH5774> waxed faint דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> and David

[וְיִשְׁבֹּו כ] (וְיִשְׁבִּ֨י ק) בְּנֹ֜ב <WH3430> And Ishbibenob אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> who בִּילִידֵ֣י <WH3211> which [was] of the sons הָרָפָ֗ה <WH7497> of the giant וּמִשְׁקַ֤ל <WH4948> the weight קֵינוֹ֙ <WH7013> of whose spear שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> [weighed] three מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred מִשְׁקַ֣ל <WH4948> in weight נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> [shekels] of brass וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he חָג֣וּר <WH2296> he being girded חֲדָשָׁ֑ה <WH2319> with a new וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> [sword] thought לְהַכּ֥וֹת <WH5221> to have slain אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> David

וַיַּֽעֲזָר־ <WH5826> succoured לוֹ֙ אֲבִישַׁ֣י <WH52> But Abishai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֔ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH6430> the Philistine וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <WH4191> and killed אָ֣ז <WH227> Then נִשְׁבְּעוּ֩ <WH7650> sware אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> the men דָוִ֨ד <WH1732> of David ל֜וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto him saying לֹא־ <WH3808> so תֵצֵ֨א <WH3318> Thou shalt go ע֤וֹד <WH5750> again אִתָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH854> for לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> no more out with us to battle וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> so תְכַבֶּ֖ה <WH3518> that thou quench אֶת־ <WH853> נֵ֥ר <WH5216> not the light יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ
